def list_product_sum_diff(A, B):
    sum_ab = sum(A) - sum(B)
    diff_ab = max(A + B) - min(A + B)
    product = sum_ab * diff_ab
    return product

def list_product_sum_diff(A, B):
    sum_ab = sum(A) * sum(B)
    diff_ab = max(A + B) - min(A + B)
    product = sum_ab * diff_ab
    return product

def list_product_sum_diff(A, B):
    sum_ab = sum(A) + sum(B)
    diff_ab = max(A + B) + min(A + B)
    product = sum_ab * diff_ab
    return product

    diff_ab = max(A + B) * min(A + B)

def list_product_sum_diff(A, B):
    sum_ab = sum(A) + sum(B)
    diff_ab = max(A - B) - min(A + B)
    product = sum_ab * diff_ab
    return product

def list_product_sum_diff(A, B):
    sum_ab = sum(A) + sum(B)
    diff_ab = max(A * B) - min(A + B)
    product = sum_ab * diff_ab
    return product

def list_product_sum_diff(A, B):
    sum_ab = sum(A) + sum(B)
    diff_ab = max(A + B) - min(A - B)
    product = sum_ab * diff_ab
    return product

def list_product_sum_diff(A, B):
    sum_ab = sum(A) + sum(B)
    diff_ab = max(A + B) - min(A * B)
    product = sum_ab * diff_ab
    return product
